IDBTransactionError.summary:
The IDBTransaction.error property of the interface
returns the type of error when there is an unsuccessful transaction.

-Reference example: To-do Notifications (View the example live).

IDBTransactionError.value:
A containing the relevant error, or null if there are none.It can be a reference to the same error as the request object that raised it, or a transaction
failure (for example QuotaExceededError).This property is null if the transaction is not finished, or is finished and
was successfully committed.
